text: Otradny () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Takhtamukayskoye Rural Settlement of Takhtamukaysky District, the Republic of Adygea, Russia. The population was 671 as of 2018. There are 6 streets. == References == Category:Rural localities in Takhtamukaysky District
title: Otradny, Takhtamukaysky District, Republic of Adygea
